data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Jasmin Kurtic.
In the minute 1, Yann Karamoh instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in Hellas Verona.
Can Hellas Verona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Parma Calcio's half?
In the minute 3, Hellas Verona are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Antonio Giua awards Hellas Verona a goal kick.
Parma Calcio are caught offside.
In the minute 5, Corner awarded to Parma Calcio.
Hellas Verona awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Hellas Verona.
In the minute 6, Hellas Verona have been awarded a corner by Antonio Giua.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Parma Calcio in their own half.
In the minute 9, Parma Calcio have a goal kick.
Antonio Giua signals a free kick to Hellas Verona in their own half.
Hellas Verona advance rapidly upfield but Antonio Giua blows for offside.
In the minute 10, Hellas Verona drives forward and Andrea Favilli gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Parma Calcio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Antonio Giua awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 12, In Parma a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Parma Calcio in their own half.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona at Ennio Tardini.
In the minute 15, Corner awarded to Hellas Verona.
Davide Faraoni (Hellas Verona) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Hellas Verona have been awarded a corner by Antonio Giua.
In the minute 17, Antonio Giua signals a free kick to Hellas Verona.
Free kick for Hellas Verona in the half of Parma Calcio.
Bruno Alves for Parma Calcio has been booked by Antonio Giua and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 21, In Parma Hellas Verona drive forward through Antonin Barak. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Davide Faraoni (Hellas Verona) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Hellas Verona have been awarded a corner by Antonio Giua.
In the minute 24, In Parma Hellas Verona attack through Andrea Favilli. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Parma Calcio goal kick.
Antonio Giua waits before resuming play because Marcello Gazzola for Parma Calcio is still down.
In the minute 25, Parma Calcio to take a throw-in in Hellas Verona territory.
Antonio Giua signals a Hellas Verona throw-in in Parma Calcio's half.
Antonio Giua signals a free kick to Parma Calcio in their own half.
In the minute 28, Parma Calcio's Gervinho misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Hellas Verona at Ennio Tardini.
Can Hellas Verona capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 30, Andrea Favilli for the away team is judged to be offside.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Parma.
Parma Calcio needs to be cautious. Hellas Verona have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Parma Calcio in their own half.
Parma Calcio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Parma Calcio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 34, Ball safe as Parma Calcio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Parma a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
In the minute 36, Hellas Verona push upfield but Antonio Giua quickly pulls them for offside.
Ball safe as Hellas Verona is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hellas Verona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 37, Parma Calcio have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona in the half of Parma Calcio.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona in their own half.
In the minute 40, Throw-in Parma Calcio.
Andrea Favilli for Hellas Verona is whistled offside.
Marcello Gazzola for Parma Calcio is back on the field again.
In the minute 42, Ball goes out of play for a Hellas Verona goal kick.
In Parma, Riccardo Gagliolo of Parma Calcio is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Parma Calcio.
Gervinho (Parma Calcio) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Parma Calcio.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Parma Calcio have been awarded a corner by Antonio Giua.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona at Ennio Tardini.
In the minute 45, Antonio Giua blows to end the first-half.
Darko Lazovic is replacing Matteo Lovato for Hellas Verona at Ennio Tardini.
Antonio Giua has blown to start the second-half.
Antonio Giua signals a Parma Calcio throw-in in Hellas Verona's half.
In the minute 47, Goal kick for Parma Calcio at Ennio Tardini.
Antonio Giua awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Parma Calcio.
In the minute 48, Antonio Giua signals a free kick to Parma Calcio in their own half.
Free kick for Parma Calcio in the half of Hellas Verona.
Corner awarded to Parma Calcio.
In the minute 52, Antonio Giua awards Hellas Verona a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona in the half of Parma Calcio.
In the minute 54, Davide Faraoni of Hellas Verona smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Important block from the Hellas Verona defence as Jasmin Kurtic fires in a strike for Parma Calcio.
Parma Calcio have been awarded a corner by Antonio Giua.
In the minute 56, Can Parma Calcio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hellas Verona's half?
Antonio Giua signals a free kick to Hellas Verona.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Parma.
In the minute 58, Ivan Juric is making the team's second substitution at Ennio Tardini with Eddie Salcedo replacing Antonin Barak.
Ebrima Colley is replacing Mattia Zaccagni for the away team.
Andrea Favilli (Hellas Verona) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 60, It's a goal kick for the home team in Parma.
Corner awarded to Hellas Verona.
Hellas Verona to take a throw-in in Parma Calcio territory.
In the minute 62, Goal kick for Parma Calcio at Ennio Tardini.
Parma Calcio make their first substitution with Andreas Cornelius replacing Vincent Laurini.
The home team have replaced Yann Karamoh with Andreas Cornelius. This is the second substitution made today by Fabio Liverani.
In the minute 64, Riccardo Gagliolo is on a sub for Hernani for Parma Calcio.
Ball safe as Parma Calcio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
At Ennio Tardini, Federico Dimarco has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 66, Antonio Giua signals a free kick to Parma Calcio in their own half.
Free kick Parma Calcio.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Andreas Cornelius.
In the minute 68, Parma Calcio’s Andreas Cornelius is on his feet again at Ennio Tardini.
Hellas Verona awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Ennio Tardini, Hellas Verona are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 71, Antonio Giua awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Parma Calcio in their own half.
Antonio Giua signals a Parma Calcio throw-in in Hellas Verona's half.
In the minute 74, Parma Calcio are pushing forward but Juraj Kucka's finish is wide of the goal.
Antonio Giua awards Hellas Verona a goal kick.
In the minute 75, Free kick Hellas Verona.
Fabio Liverani (Parma Calcio) is making a fourth substitution, with Alberto Grassi replacing Jasmin Kurtic.
Ball goes out of play for a Parma Calcio goal kick.
Parma Calcio have been awarded a corner by Antonio Giua.
In the minute 78, Parma Calcio's Andreas Cornelius is on target but unsuccessful.
Parma Calcio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Parma Calcio in their own half.
In the minute 81, Antonio Giua signals a free kick to Parma Calcio in their own half.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio at Ennio Tardini.
Free kick for Parma Calcio in their own half.
In the minute 83, Hellas Verona have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona in the half of Parma Calcio.
Gaston Brugman gets his shot on target but fails to score for Parma Calcio.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Parma Calcio close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Parma.
In the minute 86, Hellas Verona have been awarded a corner by Antonio Giua.
Hellas Verona pushes forward through Koray Gunter, whose finish on goal is saved.
The away team replace Mert Cetin with Lubomir Tupta.
Can Parma Calcio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hellas Verona's half?
In the minute 88, In Parma a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Antonio Giua signals a free kick to Parma Calcio in their own half.
Parma Calcio are whistled for offside.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Parma Calcio to take a throw-in in Hellas Verona territory.
Juraj Kucka (Parma Calcio) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Parma Calcio have a dangerous throw-in.
Hellas Verona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's 1-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
